subject: Re: Arabic for English?
msgSnippet: Charles, I have had a chance to look at your GP table for Arabic for English. It seems quite workable with the additional letters for the missing phonemes. I
messageBody:
Charles,

I have had a chance to look at your GP table for Arabic for English.
It seems quite workable with the additional letters for the missing
phonemes.

I will be glad to make a gif image of the table for those who don't
want to download the 2Mb Unicode arabic font.

I have an application for this writing system. Another member of
this group said that he just liked the look of Arabic.

What do you see as the reason why the general public would be
interested in reading English in an augmented arabic script?

Regards,

Steve

Charles,

I have had a chance to look at your GP table for Arabic for English.
It seems quite workable with the additional letters for the missing 
phonemes.

I will be glad to make a gif image of the table for those who don't 
want to download the 2Mb Unicode arabic font.

I have an application for this writing system.  Another member of 
this group said that he just liked the look of Arabic.  

What do you see as the reason why the general public would be 
interested in reading English in an augmented arabic script?

Regards,

Steve
